Container.Name: Guacamole
Container.Description: [h3]Guacamole[/h3]Guacamole is a clientless remote desktop gateway. It supports standard protocols like VNC and RDP.[br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]Be sure to change the Host port from [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']8080[/span] to [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']something else[/span] as [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']8080[/span] is quite a common port.[/b][br][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is where Guacamole will store it\'s properties files and the database which contains data for users and connections.[br] Initial username and password are [b]guacadmin[/b]
